name: NSDraggingSource
desc: A set of methods that are implemented by the source object in a dragging session.

items.name: func draggingSession(NSDraggingSession, sourceOperationMaskFor: NSDraggingContext) -> NSDragOperation
items.desc: Declares the types of operations the source allows to be performed.

items.name: func draggingSession(NSDraggingSession, endedAt: NSPoint, operation: NSDragOperation)
items.desc: Invoked when the dragging session has completed.

items.name: func draggingSession(NSDraggingSession, movedTo: NSPoint)
items.desc: Invoked when the drag moves on the screen.

items.name: func draggingSession(NSDraggingSession, willBeginAt: NSPoint)
items.desc: Invoked when the drag will begin.

items.name: func ignoreModifierKeys(for: NSDraggingSession) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the modifier keys will be ignored for this dragging session.
